headline: Nitish set to take oath as Bihar CM for record 10th time at Gandhi Maidan
news_summary: Janata Dal (United) leader Nitish Kumar is scheduled to be sworn in as Bihar chief minister for a record 10th time in a grand ceremony at Patna's historic Gandhi Maidan. The event follows his election as leader of the NDA legislature party and the formal completion of government formation steps; Prime Minister Narendra Modi and senior leaders from NDA constituents are expected to attend. Media reports note attention on portfolio allocation and deputy(s) to be named as the new cabinet is finalised.
